deleghe.title: Delegations of authority
deleghe.description: Here you can manage the company's authorised representatives and authoritys of authority. "Authorised representatives" are the people appointed by the company to read the notifications. "Delegations of authority" or "authorities" are the forms indicating the authorities held by the company.
deleghe.delegatorsApiErrorMessage: We were unable to retrieve the data regarding your company's authorities.
deleghe.accept_description: To accept the authority, enter the code that {{name}} shared with you.
deleghe.revocation_question: Do you want to revoke the authority to {{delegate}}?
deleghe.rejection_question: Do you want to decline the authority from {{delegator}}?
deleghe.subtitle_rejection: If you decline, you won't be able to read notifications from {{delegator}}.
deleghe.subtitle_revocation: You will no longer be able to read notifications from {{recipient}}.
deleghe.error_subtitle: We were unable to load the page. Please reload it, or try again later.
deleghe.no_delegates: {{organizationName}} has not authorised anyone to read the notifications. <0>Add an authority</0>.
deleghe.no_delegators_after_filters: No results from these filters. <0>Remove filters</0>.
deleghe.show_code_title: Verification code for the authority to {{name}}
deleghe.show_code_subtitle: Share this code with the authorised representative: they will have to enter it when accepting the authority.
deleghe.associate-groups-title: Do you want to assign the authority to a group?
deleghe.edit-groups-title: Edit the group assigned to this authority
deleghe.associate-groups-subtitle: The group administrator will be able to manage the authority. Users in the group will only be able to read the notifications related to that authority.
deleghe.accepted-error: Due to an error, the authority was not accepted. Press Cancel and try again.
deleghe.updated-error: An error occurred and the group was not edited. Please try again.
deleghe.revoke-error: An error occurred and the authority was not revoked. Please try again.
deleghe.reject-error: An error occurred and the authority was not declined. Please try again.

pIvaAndFiscalCode.wrong: The fiscal code entered is incorrect

nuovaDelega.createdDescription: Share the verification code with the authorised representative: they will have to enter it when first logging in to SEND, and accept the request.
nuovaDelega.title: Add an authority
nuovaDelega.subtitle: Enter the details of the person or entity you wish to authorise to read your notifications.

form.viewFrom: The person will be able to view notifications from*:
form.date-duration: Period of validity of the authority*
form.verificationCodeDescr: Share this code with the authorised representative: they will have to enter it when accepting the authority.

fiscalCode.wrong: The fiscal code entered is incorrect

entiSelected.required: Please select at least one organisation

pIvaAndFiscalCode.wrong: The fiscal code entered is incorrect

already_exists.title: Authority already present
already_exists.message: The person you indicated already has an authority. Delete it and create a new one.
